text: Raymond James O'Connor (6 March 1926 - 25 February 2013) was the 22nd Premier of Western Australia from 25 January 1982 until 25 February 1983. He was from the Liberal Party. He became Premier when Charles Court resigned. Later he was convicted of fraud and spent time in prison. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Australian criminals Category:Fraudsters Category:Liberal Party of Australia politicians Category:Politicians from Perth, Western Australia Category:Premiers of Western Australia
title: Ray O'Connor
